amendment.description: Amendment inserted language to end the practice of allowing groups to display Confederate flags on federally managed cemeteries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement National Park Service Director's Order 61 as it pertains to allowing a grave in any Federal cemetery to be decorated with a Confederate flag.
